statements: DELETE FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE age >= 30 AND gender = 'F';
DELETE FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE location = 'New York' AND behavior LIKE '%shopping%';
DELETE FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE interests = 'Sports' OR interests = 'Fitness';
DELETE FROM customer_behavior WHERE subscription_status = false;
DELETE FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 50 AND location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM customer_demographics WHERE age < 30 AND gender = 'Male'
DELETE FROM customer_behaviors WHERE subscription_status = 'Cancelled' OR subscription_status = 'Expired'
DELETE FROM customer_interests WHERE interests LIKE '%technology%'
DELETE FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 50 AND location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM customer_interests WHERE interest_category = 'Sports' AND interest_level < 3;
DELETE FROM segmentation_rules WHERE rule_name = 'Inactive Users';
